title: HIPPA PCI DSS
extract: HIPAA and PCI are two distinct and different sets of requirements. Each is specifically designed for different types of information. HIPAA was designed by government committees trying to protect citizen data. PCI was designed by a private industry to reduce fraud-related costs regarding loss of card data.May 20, 2014
